entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support running endpoints filters in MVC #42799
    7.0-rc1
  • user-jwts prints error message on `path1` #42794
  • Custom naming when binding nested objects as properties of a model #42790
  • Performance optimizations for streams now that the WebTransport PR introduced new stream types #42789
    .NET 8 Planning
  • WebTransport PR follow-ups #42788
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Adjusting the default Kestrel development certificate to support WebTransport #42787
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Adding more tests to WebTransport #42786
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Implementing WebTransport over HTTP/2 #42785
    Backlog
  • Adding datagrams support to WebTransport #42784
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Connection disconnected with error 'Error: Server timeout elapsed without receiving a message from the server.'. #42778
  • Disable Tracing in production #42776
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing failed to build with error MSB4186 #42772

Closed

  • InternalVisibleTo for not supported extension #42317
  • HTTP/3: Support client certificates on non-Windows platforms #35800
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Kestrel: No error logged if the user does not have access to certificate private key #42643
  • Automatically generate OpenAPI security schemas for bearer-based auth #42234
  • Web API call succeeds but returns 0 bytes for large response objects #42726
  • [Question] Implementation of IOQueue's Execute #42735
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ObjectPool inconsistent versioning #42773
  • Improve Default Blazor WASM Loading Experience #37199
    7.0-preview7
  • dotnet 6 angular template does not work out of the box #42632
  • Blazor component lifecycle and state management. #42758
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection PersistKeysToDbContext - CreateNewKey fails with exception #42769

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused namespace from webapi template #42798
    area-mvc
  • Clean up localization files #42797
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • [release/2.1] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42795
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [release/3.1] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42793
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [release/6.0] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42792
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Move builds to MacOS 11 #42791
    area-infrastructure
  • HTTP/3: Complete support for UseHttps #42774
    area-runtime

Merged

  • HTTP/3: Enable client cert tests on non-Windows OSes #42783
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Update DefaultChunkSize comment in ChunkingCookieManager #42777
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Support loading OIDC options from configuration (#42679) #42771
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4556086` to `bea621c` #42782
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Correct a typo in the code comment #42753
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `e89e601` to `960bb9a` #42781
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, blog-candidate, 7.0-preview7
  • [Migrated] - Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42506
    area-infrastructure
  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
  • Cleanup AspNetCoreAnalyzers #42757
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Rename ConfigureRouteHandlerJsonOptions to ConfigureHttpJsonOptions #42747
    area-web-frameworks
  • [draft] JavaScript interop via [JSImport] and [JSExport] #41665
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • [wip][blazor] Delegate loading of assets to runtime #42770
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • Add test for assembly versions in our packages #41761
    area-infrastructure
  • Ban usages of GetTypeByMetadataName #42761
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Cleanup Mvc Analyzers #42754
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Backport/pr 42384 to release/7.0 preview7 #42741
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
